update_domain_record.name: Update DNS Record
update_domain_record.description: Updates the value of a DigitalOcean DNS domain record.

record.name: Record
record.description:
The name of the record.
Use '@' if you want to update the 'root' of the domain.

value.name: Value
value.description: The value to assign to the record, typically an IP address or another DNS name.

type.name: Type
type.description: The type of the DNS record.
